description: This file defines the NoteDao interface for database access operations related to Note entities, including CRUD and search queries, using Room Persistence Library annotations.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Room DAO interface providing methods for CRUD operations and queries on Note entities.

methods.name: observeAll
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of all notes ordered by their last update time in descending order.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Finds a note by its ID, returning null if not found.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or replaces a note in the database, returning the row ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a specified note from the database.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches notes by a query string matching title, content, or tags, returning a LiveData list ordered by update time.
